DESCRIPTION: Allows you to see the information of a role.
INFOS:
**Informations on the role:** {{role}}

🔢 | Number of member that have the role: **{{members}}**

🌐 | Mentionnable: **{{mentionable}}**

🕐 | Creation date: **{{date}}**
